website_summaries.verdict: Top choice for those who like to organize everything in the house.
pros: 3 inner compartments – one each for trash, recycling, and  anything else
Some owners use the third container for compost materials or dog food
Includes labels so you can make sure everyone knows what goes where
Lids open by pressing on a foot pedal, a bonus for those who don't like sensor cans
cons: While each container holds 5.33 gallons of materials, some owners wish each container was larger, especially the one for recyclables

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: I spent a good amount of effort in researching various multi compartment trash bins, and despite the few bad reviews decided to order this item. Big mistake!!! This item is made of very low quality materials. All mechanical parts of this bin are flimsy. The stainless steel shell is the only part that is quality material. 2 of the 3 lids opened only 1-2" when I stepped on the foot pedals. The one that opened properly then wouldn't close unless I pushed it down with my hand. Save your money and avoid the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Vineta

customer_reviews.title: This trash can is exactly as described but comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is exactly as described but comes with an AWFUL chemical smell, which hasn’t gone away even after months of use. Additionally, ours came with a bag of trash in it (wish I was joking....).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Product is too small.
customer_reviews.text: Wayyyyy too small to use for recycling. If the entire unit was much taller that would help.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Not 16-gal
customer_reviews.text: Step and Sort description clearly says it is 16-gal compartments and they are nowhere near that big. Maybe 10-gal at best. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Just received & set up....so far I’m pleased with it! The 3 removable bins are larger than I expected based on other reviews. I do agree the lift mechanisms are a little flimsy so hoping they hold up. It’s just my husband & I so shouldn’t get to much abuse. I do wish the top would stay up when you step on the pedal but just a preference not a deal breaker. Fortunately, no chemical smell as others have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: These are not 16 gallon. The 13 gallon bags we got are still too big. Try 10 gallon at best. Had I known they were only that big I wouldn't have bothered. We can fill that in 2 days easy. But it's good for sorting - we have trash, recycling, and aluminum in each of the three slots and that part works well. It just required a lot more dumping than expected based on description
customer_reviews.author: Tigger62077

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: I like this item and it works for exactly what i needed. I wish it had somewhere to put a label in so people knew what each one was for. I also had to take out the silver things that hold that bags down because they always rip the bags. Each one is very small, i really wish for the price each compartment was bigger, they feel up way too quickly for a family
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lish

customer_reviews.title: Lid already broke before 30 days was up
customer_reviews.text: Love this garbage minus the lid issue. It's a little small but it's just 2 of us so it works. But the lid broke before even 30 days was up. I don't have time to deal with exchanging it so we'll be keeping it broken lid and all. Very expensive for the quality but I don't have $179+ for the simple human version.
customer_reviews.author: TravelPlaySurf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an "organized" home
customer_reviews.text: Love this can. It's for the kitchen and we need it for trash, recycle and refund cans. Unfortunately we discovered it during the pandemic, but this not only matches the stainless steel appliances in our kitchen but will served to keep us on our toes with regards to returning cans/bottles for returns ...timely. It doesn't hold a lot, but imo is certainly adequate for the amount of these items you will want inside your home..lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Works perfect, arrived early!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! It has saved so much space in my kitchen and looks great. Each contairer is easily removable and the steps work great for opening. The lids close securely and contain any smell to inside the can. The only thing I would change would be to make the recycling container bigger otherwise its perfect. It also showed up in early! I was expecting a week and it arivved the same day as my 2day shipping orders.
customer_reviews.author: Private user

customer_reviews.title: Nice trash can for those who need recycle, compost, and trash
customer_reviews.text: In San Francisco we have to have three different classes of trash, recycling and compost in addition to trash. This is useful as we can separate them. We bought 8 gallon bags for them, but 10 gallon would fit better. My only gripe with this trash can is how hard it is to pull the bins out of it. You can't really grab onto the bin easily if a bag is over it.
customer_reviews.author: Alien Rides

customer_reviews.title: Bit very practical
customer_reviews.text: Each bin is so so very small. Have to order special bags or the lid does not close properly. I’m so unhappy with this product, I wish the bin were bigger and there was a hole in the side of each bin so you could use a normal garbage bag(just tuck it in). Not very good product for a family home unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 3 compartments.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like it. A little on the expensive side. The bar get's stuck pulling the trash bag out (but that happened on our other one) Wish it was easy to find compostable bags for the compost bin (it needs to be emptied before full because of the smell).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The description is a little deceiving and the three cans ...
customer_reviews.text: The description is a little deceiving and the three cans are so small it hardly pays to use. I donated to Goodwill within a week of having. Each space is just to small.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cape

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold enough
customer_reviews.text: We loved the look and feel of this trash sorter, but after using it for a month or two, we replaced it with larger containers. It just didn't hold enough.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystene

customer_reviews.title: Smart buy
customer_reviews.text: A little on the small side the back handle isn’t the best but works overall very pleased with the function for my organizational needs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can
customer_reviews.text: Not the best when it comes to empty it out and replace bags.
customer_reviews.author: Dima

customer_reviews.title: Recycling bins needed
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of having bags all over the place with different items in it. This was perfect. One bin for glass, cans and plastic. One for cardboard and a third for compost. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Puig

customer_reviews.title: Good construction
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Fair price. Needs some space above it to open fully.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaNinja

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Function in a Compact Unit
customer_reviews.text: I have been very pleased with our recycling bin. The bins aren't huge, but big enough that we need to empty them only once or twice a week. The unit itself is attractive enough for us to keep in our newly remodeled kitchen, and its so convenient to have all of our recycling bins together.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Burns

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like that it was small and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: hector rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great if your old with not much garbage to dispose.
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, but way too tiny for bottles, & other bulky items. I also didn't realize it has the separate petals going the long way. I have nowhere to fit it, but too big to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy K

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our recycling needs, and goes well with our stainless appliances. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably sturdy for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you can get past the initial smell.....I let it sit outdoors for multiple day to air. Reasonably sturdy for the price. With a two person household, it will serve us well. If you have more people, it may be too small.
customer_reviews.author: JenJ

customer_reviews.title: I like the product - however
customer_reviews.text: I like the product - however, one of the black bins came cracked on the bottom. Is it possible to get a replacement or order a replacement bin?
customer_reviews.author: Maja Kunzi

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very faulty design, where the inside hardware falls apart in a few months under minimal use. Very cheaply made for the price, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Packaged well, compact.
customer_reviews.text: great size for my small apartment kitchen. Sturdy and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery! Happy with the size of each trash compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: the product arrived with a good size dent along the bottom of one side
customer_reviews.text: First off, the product arrived with a good size dent along the bottom of one side, the side that shows. Second I wish the bins were a little larger, I recycle everything and it's been a pain to empty the bins when I place a bag in each bin it's very awkward. I do like the way it looks in my new kitchen, it's much neater than the bags hanging on the cupboard knobs!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Murray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Recycling
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs. We live in an area where recycling, including organics / composite is mandatory. A compact, 3 compartment garbage can is exactly what I was looking for. Appears to be well made, and arrived well packaged. It may not be the most "high end" garbage can, but if you want to recycle, this is a great find.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but...
customer_reviews.text: The three units are great but still small. Finding bags which fit nice is not that easy. The pedals work great and so do the pull out buckets. It would be better if there were 2 units, however it does help separating the recyclables. Not bad but could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bell

customer_reviews.title: Using for dogs food!
customer_reviews.text: I use this container for my 3 dogs' food. Each one needs a different food and this product is perfect. The dogs can not get into it and neither can mice!
customer_reviews.author: Alo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed it for!
customer_reviews.text: We use it to handle re-cycle items in a small kitchen and it is perfect! It looks good with our stainless steel appliances too!
customer_reviews.author: KingOfCatan

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. We had been looking for something with three compartments that is relatively small and this is it. Some reviewers said the foot pedals are flimsy but they seem fine to me.
customer_reviews.author: rob williams

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The bins are too small and it's very difficult to remove the trash liners. Not worth it at all. Better off with separate larger trash cans
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the compartments are just too small for recycling to really be useful. I use 2 for recycling and 1 for ...
customer_reviews.text: Had about a year. This thing makes a lot of sense in theory, but the compartments are just too small for recycling to really be useful. I use 2 for recycling and 1 for compost. I really like this idea but in the real work just makes taking out the recycling worse, but compost much easisr.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar B. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed to help us sort our garbage and recycling
customer_reviews.text: Despite other reviews complaints about the bag not fitting well, it works perfectly for us. Just what we needed to help us sort our garbage and recycling.
customer_reviews.author: Natascha S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is well made and nice looking. However, each of the three compartments are quite small.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Todd T. Russell

customer_reviews.title: A Good-Looking, Serviceable Sorter for Home Recycling
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine choice for sorting residential recyclables. Clean, neat, and large enough to handle a week-s worth of empties. Vendor shipped the product quickly and it arrived in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Powell

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something to keep our trash, recycling and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to keep our trash, recycling and dog food in one area and this worked out perfectly. holds a lot more than you would think.
customer_reviews.author: Jammy302

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I had people asking me where did I get this container Amazon I said
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great garbage composter can
customer_reviews.text: We love it. We put our compost, recyclying and garbage in each bin. They are very easy to empty and keep clean. I bought one for my 70 year old mother!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia chackerian

customer_reviews.title: Makes recycling easier
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for recycling for a small family. We put labels on each lid to make it easier for visitors to use. We also put a small coat hook on the one for trash. It was easier for grandma to use than the foot pedal.
customer_reviews.author: CO

customer_reviews.title: The Best Bin I've Found
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Just perfect! It helps manage garbage and recycling in a very slick, attractive way!
customer_reviews.author: Shoppin' Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Takes the Mess out of Recycling
customer_reviews.text: Nuts about this. Super easy to use and I'm so grateful to not have annoyingly ugly and messy paper bags in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisarn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for separating the waste
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for separating the waste. The only thing I don't like is the steel gets water spots easily. Light weight and easy to move
customer_reviews.author: Leah Lovelight Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hey that's pretty handy! I hope it lasts. Really tidies up the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long foot pedals will last. They are on flimsy side. Also don't plan on using one of the 3 containers for trash, it's too small. Perfect for bottles, cans and sorting mail, newspapers or small cardboard products.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second of these. Previous lasted three years. All buckets were cracked and one pedal broken at that point.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A Froman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to clean and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to clean and good quality. Very smelly for the first month (I guess the plastic?) but after that it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Really helps out with sorting
customer_reviews.text: We used to have to go outside every time we needed to recycle something. Not any more. Very convenient, well built, stylish. Makes recycling modern and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Way too small for recycling, can get few items in before it's full, I was very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this product because the individual compartments weren't big enough for my needs but the product was very nice. Heavy, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent idea for a condo, looks great in the kitchen, where do you get bags to fit?
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect size and shape. made recycling easy. very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CMD

customer_reviews.title: Great for sorting the recyclables
customer_reviews.text: I really like the looks of this recycling sorter, very sleek and looks good next to the stainless kitchen trash container that I already had. I guess my only problem with it is that I am moving soon and I'm not sure if I have room for it in the new kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Waite

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, the mechanical parts of the foot petals seem a little less durable than I'd like for a $100+ dollar waste bin.
customer_reviews.author: John Curtis

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Being green at home had never been easier. Quality steel construction , nice looking and my wife doesn't mind it in the kitchen because it matches our appliances. Easy to dIspose of separate recyclables because of the separate compartments. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

product_meta.title: The Step N' Sort 16-Gal. 3-Compartment Stainless Steel Trash and Recycling Bin
product_meta.description: Designed to handle all of your waste, recycling and storage needs. This bin is perfect for the home or office with a heavy-duty stainless steel frame. The easy, hands-free step pedals allow you to sort your items into removable inner bins. Use this bin to sort recyclables, garbage, and organics. 900603 Features: -Inner compartments are removable and hold 5. 33 gallons each. -Fits 8 or 10 gallon trash bags. -Heavy-duty steel frame. -Hand-free step pedals. -Convenient carry handle. Open Type: -Step-On. Shape: -Rectangular. Primary Material: -Metal. Capacity: -16 Gallons. Color: -Silver.
feature_bullets: Heavy-duty steel frame; Fits 8 or 10 gallon trash bags
Three Inner compartments are removable and hold 5. 33 gallons each

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars243 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
